title: Veteran Malayalam Actor Mamukoya passes away at 76
description: In a sad news, veteran Malayalam actor Mamukoya passed away at the age of 76, two days after he collapsed during an event in Malappuram district. The actor had acted in over 450 movies over five decades and popularised the Moppila dialect of Malabar. Kerala chief minister Pinarayi Vijayan and many film personalities condoled the actor’s death. He will be remembered for his one-liners, toothy grins and rustic look. Our deepest condolences to his family and loved ones during this difficult time.
